title: Home ♥ Podravka
snippet: Podravka is a food processing and pharmaceutical company producing high quality products, respecting the principles of sustainable development, taking care of the society and employees, aiming to achieve economic growth.

title: About ♥ Podravka
snippet: Podravka's history begins in 1934 when Wolf brothers start a fruit processing workshop in Koprivnica, which was named Podravka 13 years later. Since then 75 years has passed, and today Podravka is among the leading Croatian international companies doing business around the world.

title: Company ♥ Podravka
snippet: Podravka is a food processing and pharmaceutical company producing high quality products, respecting the principles of sustainable development, taking care of the society and employees, aiming to achieve economic growth.

title: Our brands ♥ Podravka
snippet: Our brands are recognizable and favourite on Croatian and foreign markets. High quality is guaranteed by excellent raw materials, modern technological processes and knowledge. Next to quality, they are distinguished by practicality and safety of every product.

title: Our products ♥ Podravka
snippet: Surprise your taste buds with Podravka chutney! Ajvar squeeze mild Ajvar squeeze hot Chutney roasted - mild
